title: attempts to overwrite MBR record
extract: A master boot record (often shortened as MBR) is a kind of boot sector stored on a hard disk drive or other storage device that contains the necessary computer code to start the boot process. The MBR is created when a hard drive is partitioned, but it's not located within a partition.Apr 10, 2018
extract_html: A master boot record (often shortened as MBR) is a kind of boot sector stored on a hard disk drive or other storage device that contains the necessary computer code to start the boot process. The MBR is created when a hard drive is partitioned, but it's not located within a partition.Apr 10, 2018
